授業目的: Students are to be provided opportunities to explore in depth the theories and concepts related to the field of finance with special emphasis on areas related to corporate finance, risk management, insurance and risk finance.
到達目標: Students will be able to explore by themselves in depth the theories and concepts related to the field of finance with special emphasis on such areas as corporate finance, risk management, insurance and risk finance.  Students will also be able to write an academic paper at the level that they can present it in academic conferences.
授業方法: Individual consultation will be conducted. 　We will conduct classes on-line by Zoom.

評価.学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: Will be conducted at the end of the course.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Based on the quality of the research development.

name: 【800】研究指導　３３／Dissertation Seminar
